mapper.sql: select id, menu_name, parent_id, menu_order, path, component, menu_type_id, status, icon, create_time from nt_sys_menu
mapper.select: select m.id, m.parent_id from nt_sys_menu m left join nt_sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.menu_type_id=#{menuTypeId} and m.id not in (select m.parent_id from nt_sys_menu m inner join nt_sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id and rm.role_id = #{roleId}) order by m.parent_id, m.menu_order
